description:
Haruaki and his students continue to do their best to get Nyuudou back.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Liens indéfectibles. Je resterai professeur à l`école des yôkai !
Renren to Tsuzuku Enishi. Youkai Gakkou no Sense Ganbarimasu!
The Bond Continuing with Ren-Ren. The Teacher from Ghoul School Will Do His Best!
連々と続く縁. 妖怪学校の先生がんばります!
